bio: *Designer & Engineer.* [Asketic](http://asketicsf.com) *Co-founder.* __Peteris Bikis__ *I am a* [venn diagram](/venn) *of design, * [technology](/technology)*,* [the Internet](/internet)*,* [travel](/travel)*,* [cycling](/cycling)*, and* [photography](/photography)*. I love building great products. Interested in* [AI](/ai)* and a* [weirder](/weirder) *future.*
